thread.title: Hit the Links: The week of coverage leading up to Boston College-Clemson

title: Hit the Links: The week of coverage leading up to Boston College-Clemson
text:
Email @Aaron_Brenner Oct 17 2015 6:00 am Clemson fans enjoy the pre-game amnoshere. The Clemson Tigers played host to the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets at Memorial Stadium in Clemson Saturday, October 10, 2015.GWINN DAVIS / FOR POST AND COURIER × 
CLEMSON – Chock full of notes, and a few features in between, from the past week of coverage previewing Boston College-Clemson:
